events.body:
Thank you very much for this work. I had a quick look at the proposed word list and would like to make a few recommendation:

1. Please remove words that begin with identical three letters, as auto-compelete keyboards cannot differentiate them easily, e.g.:
نیک
نیکچهر
نیکدخت
نیکدل
نیکرخ
نیکروز
نیکروی
نیکزاد
نیکنام
نیکو
نیکوکار

2. Please remove words that differ only by one letter or sound too similar, as it may cause human errors, e.g.:
هومن
هوتن
هورتن

3. Please remove words that are not commonly used by average Persian speakers or hard to remember, e.g.:
نساک
هلیله
پاکفر
آبستا

4. Please add words that are commonly used by average Persian speakers and easy to remember, e.g.:
خیابان

@msnhdr Thanks for your help, we fixed previous problems.
We will appreciate if you have any other comments

@saeedgholami 
Thanks for the changes. With a quick look there are still many words in the list that are too similar. I think you need to run a script to detect and remove words that start with 3 identical letters. Examples:
مهر
مهراب
مهراسا
مهرافروز
مهرافزون
مهرافشان
مهران
مهرانگیز
مهرآمیز
مهرآور
مهربان
مهربانو
مهرپرور
مهرپوی
مهرپیکر
مهرجو
مهرچهر
مهرچین
مهرخ
مهرداد
مهرزاد
مهرکیش
مهرگان
مهرناز
مهرنگار
مهرنواز
مهرنوش
مهروی
مهری
مهریار

@saeedgholami 
Here are the group of words that must be removed on basis of similar beginnings.  The * singed words are ok to stay I think.

اتو

issue.title: Binary Lists
issue.body:
- [ ] 256/512 PGP https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PGP_word_list
- [ ] 2048 (BIP39) https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0039/bip-0039-wordlists.md
    - [ ] English https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0039/english.txt
    - [ ] Japanese https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0039/japanese.txt
    - [ ] Korean https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0039/korean.txt
    - [ ] Spanish https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0039/spanish.txt
    - [ ] Chinese https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0039/chinese_traditional.txt
    - [ ] French https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0039/french.txt
    - [ ] Italian https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0039/italian.txt
    - [ ] Russian https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/432 https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/705
    - [ ] German https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/721
    - [ ] Ukrainian https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/442
    - [ ] Czech https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/493
    - [ ] Portuguese https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/720
    - [ ] Indonesian https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/621
    - [ ] RFC-2289 https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2289
- [ ] 4096 http://www.webplaces.org/passwords/lists/hexadecimal-4096-list.txt
- [ ] 4096 https://github.com/atoponce/passplum/blob/master/packages/web/example-seed-data.json
- [ ] 4096 http://web.archive.org/web/20041016143129/http://www.tecapro.com:80/free/makepass.lst
- [ ] 4096 https://fossies.org/linux/passwdqc/wordset_4k.c
- [ ] 8192 https://github.com/ulif/diceware/blob/master/diceware/wordlists/wordlist_en_securedrop.asc
- [ ] 65536 http://www.webplaces.org/passwords/lists/hexadecimal-65536-list.txt

events.body: For now, [the author(s) of BIP 39 have decided not to accept any further word lists into BIP 39 itself, and encourage adding new ones to the WLIPs repo](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1129#issuecomment-873258377) here: https://github.com/p2w34/wlips
